settings.review_message: “I have used this product daily for a year now and have seen noticeable results. One of my 40 something neighbors (I am 63) mentioned she wanted to know what my skin care routine was. I love this entire line!”

settings.title: FIÈRA APPLE STEM CELL CREAM BENEFITS
settings.title_1: Rejuvenates skin to restore a youthful glow
settings.content_1: Fièra harnesses the proven science and power of plant stem cells to support the regeneration of aging skin, to expose firmer, fresher skin and brighten dark under eye circles. Combined with sea buckthorn oil, its anti-inflammatory properties help to reduce redness and puffiness for a healthy-looking, radiant glow.
settings.content_2: With age comes loss of moisture and elasticity in the skin, resulting in sagginess in the face and jowls, and dry, crepey skin. Hyaluronic acid increases skin’s moisture levels and can reduce the depth of lines and wrinkles. Combined with natural support ingredients, this effective formula promotes hydration and elasticity, restoring skin’s natural firmness.
settings.title_3: Reduces the appearance of crow’s feet and wrinkles
settings.content_3: With the turnover of skin cells, the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles is softened. These rare swiss apple stem cells are known to be especially effective around the eye area, reducing the appearance of crow’s feet. While many face creams are not gentle enough for the eyes, Fièra’s Apple Stem Cell Cream acts as a daily moisturizer, luxurious skin treatment and effective eye cream - all in one.
settings.title_4: Delays the skin cells from aging
settings.content_4: Fièra’s Apple Stem Cell Cream not only works to correct existing signs of aging, but to prevent future signs of aging as well. Antioxidants shield and protect the skin against sun damage, air pollution and other free radicals, while regenerative plant stem cells delay the aging process.

settings.tab_info:
Sea Buckthorn Oil

Sea buckthorn oil is a little-known berry found high above sea level (often in the Himalayan Mountains) that’s so powerful on the skin it was used for anti-aging more than 1000 years ago. It’s said to be one of the most nutrient dense plants in nature, with vitamins A, C, D, E, K, BI, and B2.

The oil from this powerful plant is just one reason why women are seeing a visible improvement in their skin using Fièra Apple Stem Cell Cream. Sea buckthorn oil helps to calm inflammation in the skin, therefore reducing the appearance of redness caused by various skin conditions and scarring. It also repairs oxidative damage and stimulates collagen production to reduce fine lines and wrinkles and refine skin’s texture.

  • Reduces redness associated with inflammation and scarring for a brighter, even skin tone
  • Promotes collagen production for firmer skin
  • Prevents excess oil production to reduce acne breakouts and blemishes

Vitamin E

Vitamin E is known to work wonders on mature skin, helping to improve various signs of aging while warding off future cell damage.

This powerful antioxidant can prevent dark spots and hyperpigmentation caused by sun exposure, and fight against skin damage from UV rays, pollution and other free radicals. Its anti-inflammatory properties have shown to be effective in calming acne-prone skin.

Skincare products containing Vitamin E provide superior moisture retention between skin cells, leaving skin feeling soft and hydrated.

  • Protects skin from oxidative damage from free radicals to delay the visible signs of aging
  • Boosts moisture retention to improve skin’s texture
  • Prevents hyperpigmentation and fades dark spots for an even complexion

Hyaluronic Acid

Hyaluronic acid is responsible for the longevity of healthy skin cells and maintaining volume and moisture in the skin. Naturally occurring in the body, almost 50% is found in the skin. However as we age, the levels of hyaluronic acid drop, resulting in a loss of skin’s volume, more visible lines and wrinkles and a dry, crepey texture.

Thankfully, hyaluronic acid can be found in quality skincare products. It attracts water to the surface of the skin for a boost of moisture - however, its formulation plays an important role in how well it performs. Fièra’s Apple Stem Cell Cream combines hyaluronic acid with other natural rejuvenating ingredients to smooth fine lines and wrinkles for younger-looking skin.

  • Boosts skin hydration for plump and dewy skin
  • Prevents build-up of dead skin cells to banish dull, dry skin
  • Nourishes collagen to promote elasticity and firmer skin

Swiss Apple Stem Cells

Fièra has harnessed the skin-regenerating and restorative powers of rare Swiss apple stem cells as a key component in our Apple Stem Cell Cream. These plant stem cells function like human stem cells for the healthy maintenance and repair of skin tissue.

Apple stem cells have been proven to support human stem cell function - which declines with age. When properly formulated into skincare with effective support ingredients, apple stem cells promote skin regeneration and repair and protect skin cells from stress.

This results in a visible reduction in the appearance of crow’s feet and other fine lines and wrinkles, and smoother, firmer, fresher-looking skin. Apple stem cells also protect the skin from damage caused by UV rays, leaving skin looking younger, longer.

Fièra has scientifically formulated the Apple Stem Cell Cream for maximum results when used twice daily.

  • Stimulates skin regeneration to expose fresh, smooth, tighter skin
  • Protects skin stem cells against premature aging to prevent lines and wrinkles
  • Increases the vitality of skin stem cells for a vibrant, youthful appearance

Natural Support Ingredients

  • Vitamin A

    Vitamin A plays an important role in keeping the top two layers of the skin healthy. It helps to promote the formation of elastin and collagen to minimize fine lines and wrinkles, and gives skin a radiant glow.

  • Glycerin

    Another water-loving humectant, glycerin is a perfect addition to our Apple Stem Cell Cream formula. Acting as an emollient, it hydrates the outer layers of the skin and leaves it feeling silky and smooth.

  • Shea Butter

    Shea butter is another effective emollient, moisturizing and softening the skin. It also improves skin’s natural barrier and protects against free radical damage, soothes inflammation and even fights against acne, making it an ideal addition to a daily skincare regime.

settings.title: Key Ingredients
settings.ingredient_list_content: Purified Water, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Stearic Acid, Malus Domestica, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Hyaluronic Acid, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Cupressus Sempervirens Oil, Sea Buckthorn Oil, Polisorbate 20, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Potassium Sorbate, Hexylene Glycol, Tocopherol Acetate (Vitamin E), Retinol Palmitate (Vitamin A)

settings.title: FAQs
settings.html:
Where Are Fièra Products Made?

Our products are all proudly formulated and produced in the USA. Depending on if you order our concealer or some of our other facial care products, they were manufactured in either New York or Florida.

What Is Your Return Policy?

We have a 30-day full money back return policy. Simply mail the products to either address:

1) USA: Fiera Cosmetics PO Box 3335, Buffalo, NY, 14240-3335
2) Canada: Fiera Cosmetics PO Box 1212 Willowdale, ON, M3J 0L3

When returning any products please ensure to include your full name, and order number on the outside of the package. Your order number can be found on the packing slip or on the order confirmation email we sent to you. Please ensure the information provided is the same credentials that were used when placing your order. This allows us to associate the returned product with the appropriate account.

As soon as we receive the return, we will process the refund right away. All refunds will go back to the original form of payment. Once the refund is processed, some banks can take up to 7-10 business days for the refund to reflect on your credit card statement.

Customers are responsible for the cost of return shipping.

Can I Purchase Fièra Products In Retail Stores?

We made the decision to not put our products in retail outlets and instead sell only to our customers directly online. Retail stores take very large margins and charge a premium for the top shelf space. Consumers get promoted products that paid the most money to be there versus being promoted the products that deliver the best results. We let our customer reviews do our selling for us and instead of buying shelf space, we take a portion of every sale donate it to help feed people in need through our partnerships with Food Rescue US and Second Harvest.

Where do your products ship from?

We ship to our US customers daily from Buffalo, NY and to our Canadian customers daily from Toronto, ON.

When is my order arriving?

All of our customer shipments are fully tracked. On the next business day following your purchase, you should have received an email from us containing your tracking information. If you don’t see this in your inbox, make sure to check your spam folder.

What concealer shade should I order?

The color you choose depends on what you'll be primarily using it for. If it's especially for under eye coverage, we recommend going a shade lighter than you'd normally choose. If it's for other full facial coverage, we recommend choosing a shade closer to what you would use for foundation. We have customers who will buy two shades so they can go lighter and darker as they need to and use the two colors to blend.
Here’s a video that should help you choose the perfectly color for you.

How do you apply the concealer?

How you apply the concealer comes down to personal preference. The concealer itself is quite thick in order to provide maximum coverage so it’s best to let it warm up a little before spreading either on the back of your hand or between your fingers.

Once warmed, most of our customers chose to use their fingers to dab it onto their skin, and then use the brush, their fingers, or a sponge to blend it.

What are the ingredients in your products:

Concealer Ingredients
Neck Cream Ingredients
Finishing Powder Ingredients
Apple Stem Cell Cream Ingredients
Citrus Stem C Serum Ingredients

What is the undertone of each concealer shade?

Light - fair cool
Neutral beige - neutral
Medium - warm
Deep - warm
Dark - cool

How long does a tube of concealer last?

It depends on the individual, as some of our customers will use it primarily as a concealer, while others use it as foundation. Our product is formulated to be quite concentrated and therefore a little goes a long way!

Do you give samples?

Unfortunately, due to the high cost of shipping and packing, we do not have samples but we do however offer a full 30 day money back guarantee. If for whatever reason you aren't satisfied you can return any of our products for a full refund

Will your products clog my pores and make me break out?

Our products are noncomedogenic and have high quality ingredients like hyaluronic acid which is light, hydrates skin and doesn't clog pores, making it much less likely that you'll breakout.

What if I order the wrong shade of concealer?

If you are unsatisfied for any reason you can return your concealer for a full refund. Please refer to our Return Policy.

Does your concealer conceal scars, brown spots, age spots, under eye bags, sun damage etc…?

Our concealer is specifically formulated for mature skin to provide excellent coverage for various signs of aging and skin imperfections.

How long does it take to ship?

In the US we use USPS First Class Mail and in Canada we use Canada Post for all our orders. We ship our orders next business day and barring any carrier delays most orders arrive within 2-4 business days.

Do you test on animals?

Absolutely not! None of our products are ever tested on animals.

Does the concealer work for rosacea?

We’ve had a lot of positive feedback from customers using our concealer who have rosacea.

How long does the concealer last?

Our concealer has been specifically formulated for all day wear.

Will the concealer work for sensitive, oily and dry skin types?

Our concealer has been formulated to work with all skin types

How do I change or cancel my subscription?

Should you wish to change or cancel your subscription, you can do so by emailing support@fieracosmetics.com or by calling customer service at 1-833-693-4372. We will be happy to assist you with whatever you need. You can reach us Monday to Friday between the hours of 8 am - 8pm, or Saturday from 9 am - 5pm, Eastern Standard Time.

How and when will I be charged for my subscription?

The credit card you used for your first subscription order will be automatically charged at the time of shipping, and at the time of shipping for every future order, depending on your selected subscription. You will never be charged shipping for any subscription orders. The charge will appear on your billing statement as Fièra Cosmetics.

settings.title: 30 Day Money Back Guarantee
settings.content: We’re so confident you'll love our Fièra products we offer a Hassle-free 30 day Money Back Guarantee. If you're not satisfied with your purchase simply return the items back to us for a full refund.

To date, Fièra has been able to donate over 1.1 million meals & counting thanks to these partnerships & their ever-growing customer base.

settings.info: Fièra Cosmetics is so confident you'll love Fièra Luxury Concealer that they offer a hassle-free 30-day money back guarantee. If for any reason you're not satisfied with your purchase they will gladly hand you back every penny of your investment, no questions asked.
